defaultMessage: Bodhi Dapp is a free, open-source, client-side interface.
It allows you to interact directly with the blockchain while remaining in full control of your keys & your funds.
Bodhi Dapp is NOT a standalone wallet. We use the Qtum Core Wallet to handle all transactions and interactions with the Qtum blockchain.
YOU and ONLY YOU are responsible for your security. This saying is applicable for all things related to blockchain and cryptocurrency.
